name: Defenestration [VR - HTC Vive]
description:
We love throw things, break things and hurt mannequins in the process and we believe you may love it too, that's why we create this early prototype, to explore the art of throwing something out of the window.

It's a basic early prototype, throw some dishes, break some dishes, hit some mannequins, score some points to test things out.

We're really appreciate hearing back from you and help us shape the experience, things like what you want to throw, what you like and what you don't is really helpful for us.
